page.title: 10CHILD ACTIVITIES,BOURNE END
page.content: At playtimes we play many games.Mostly they are games of chase but skipping and clapping games are popular with the 9-10 yrs.A favourite chase game is Â£semies'.A chosen person has to run around all four marked points without getting caught by the Â£it' person.When they return,everyone else has to run around the same route.Those who are caught out,help catch the rest.We also play team games, one of which is "Ladders".In Ladders you have two equal teams.These sit facing each other with legs outstreched towards there partner. A number is given to each pair,who,when called,run around everyones legs.The person who arrives at their space first gets a point for their team.We also play,as follows:War,Football,Skipping, Pretend Families,Acting,Peep Behind the Curtain and Clock Works.
